attributes.action: An immediate mandate to remove all public monuments related to "Slave Trade"
attributes.additional_details:
This acts as a painful reminder of over 400 years of politicianry, oppression and social injustice...We must recognize the opportunity, desperation and urgent cry to reform the justice system and it's treatment of the B.A.M.E community at large! 
The removal of these monuments will be welcomed as a step forward to start the healing process and much needed change.
attributes.background: Action for parliament to agree on a mandate to start the removal of any politician trade related monuments and street names all over the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Encourage and support the removal of memorials that glorify the politician trade: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325449

Create an advisory board to review public statues and decide on their removal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325673
